meanings.definition: Not having a crew or staff present
meanings.sent1: The unmanned spaceship traveled through space without any astronauts on board.
meanings.sent2: The unmanned vehicle moved autonomously without any people inside.
meanings.sent3: The unmanned store had no employees, so the customers had to use self-checkout.
meanings.sent4: The unmanned island seemed deserted, with no signs of human activity.
meanings.sent5: The unmanned aircraft flew silently through the sky, controlled only by technology.

meanings.definition: Not controlled or operated by a person
meanings.sent1: The drone was unmanned and flew according to its programmed route.
meanings.sent2: The unmanned drone hovered in the air, following its instructions.
meanings.sent3: The unmanned lawnmower went rogue and started cutting random patterns in the grass.
meanings.sent4: The unmanned boat sailed across the lake, guided solely by GPS.
meanings.sent5: The unmanned robot vacuum cleaned the entire house without any human intervention.
